gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 119, 76ers 113
gameRecap.excerpt: Jaime Jaquez Jr. (31 points, 10 rebounds) leads the Heat over the 76ers, 119-113.  Bam Adebayo (26 points, 15 rebounds, five assists) and Tyler Herro (22 points, six rebounds, five assists) combine for 48 points in the victory, while Tobias Harris (27 points, seven rebounds, six assists) and Kelly Oubre Jr. (25 points, seven rebounds, six 3PM) combine for 52 for the 76ers in the losing effort.  The Heat improve to 18-12 on the season, while the 76ers fall to 20-9.
